Web designer's checklist

Built with Vue.js and persistant storage.

Web designerâ€™s checklist app. Built with Vue.js and persistant storage.

Preview

http://imaginarydesign.github.io/web-check/

Requirements

  • npm
  • Gulp
  • Bower

Installation

$ git clone https://github.com/Imaginarydesign/webdev-checklist.git
$ cd web-check
$ bower install
$ npm install

To run locally:

$ gulp serve

Support

Please open an issue for support.

Contributing

Please contribute using Github Flow. Create a branch, add commits, and open a pull request.
